acknowledgments.summary: Uri Katz of Claroty Research reported these vulnerabilities to GE.

notes.text: This CSAF advisory was extracted from unstructured data and may contain inaccuracies. If you notice any errors, please reach out to the designated contact at CISA CSAF: central@cisa.dhs.gov
notes.title: CISA Disclaimer

notes.title: Legal Notice

notes.text: Successful exploitation of these vulnerabilities could crash the device after access, cause a buffer overflow condition, and allow remote code execution.
notes.title: Risk evaluation

notes.text: CISA recommends users take defensive measures to minimize the risk of exploitation of these vulnerabilities. Specifically, users should:
notes.title: Recommended Practices

notes.text: CISA also provides a section for control systems security recommended practices on the ICS webpage at cisa.gov/ics. Several CISA products detailing cyber defense best practices are available for reading and download, including Improving Industrial Control Systems Cybersecurity with Defense-in-Depth Strategies.
notes.title: Recommended Practices

notes.text: Additional mitigation guidance and recommended practices are publicly available on the ICS webpage at cisa.gov/ics in the technical information paper, ICS-TIP-12-146-01B--Targeted Cyber Intrusion Detection and Mitigation Strategies.
notes.title: Recommended Practices

notes.text: No known public exploits specifically target these vulnerabilities.Â
notes.title: Exploitability

product.name: Proficy Historian: Proficy Historian v7.0 and higher versions

cwe.name: Authentication Bypass Using an Alternate Path or Channel

notes.text: Even if the authentication fails for local service authentication, the requested command could still execute regardless of authentication status.-CVE-2022-46732 has been assigned to this vulnerability. A CVSS v3 base score of 9.8 has been calculated; the CVSS vector string is (AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:H/A:H).
notes.title: Vulnerability Summary

remediations.details: GE Digital released Proficy Historian 2023 to mitigate these vulnerabilities.  SIMs have also been released for all affected versions.
Users can find out more about the vulnerabilities, how to obtain, and install the updates by visiting this notification document from GE Digital.

cwe.name: Unrestricted Upload of File with Dangerous Type

notes.text: An unauthorized user could alter or write files with full control over the path and content of the file.-CVE-2022-46660 has been assigned to this vulnerability. A CVSS v3 base score of 7.5 has been calculated; the CVSS vector string is (AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:H/A:N).
notes.title: Vulnerability Summary

remediations.details: GE Digital released Proficy Historian 2023 to mitigate these vulnerabilities.  SIMs have also been released for all affected versions.
Users can find out more about the vulnerabilities, how to obtain, and install the updates by visiting this notification document from GE Digital.

notes.text: An unauthorized user could be able to read any file on the system, potentially exposing sensitive information.-CVE-2022-43494 has been assigned to this vulnerability. A CVSS v3 base score of 7.5 has been calculated; the CVSS vector string is (AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:N/A:N).
notes.title: Vulnerability Summary

remediations.details: GE Digital released Proficy Historian 2023 to mitigate these vulnerabilities.  SIMs have also been released for all affected versions.
Users can find out more about the vulnerabilities, how to obtain, and install the updates by visiting this notification document from GE Digital.

notes.text: An unauthorized user could possibly delete any file on the system.-CVE-2022-46331 has been assigned to this vulnerability. A CVSS v3 base score of 7.5 has been calculated; the CVSS vector string is (AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:H/A:N).
notes.title: Vulnerability Summary

remediations.details: GE Digital released Proficy Historian 2023 to mitigate these vulnerabilities.  SIMs have also been released for all affected versions.
Users can find out more about the vulnerabilities, how to obtain, and install the updates by visiting this notification document from GE Digital.

notes.text: An unauthorized user with network access and the decryption key could decrypt sensitive data, such as usernames and passwords.-CVE-2022-38469 has been assigned to this vulnerability. A CVSS v3 base score of 7.5 has been calculated; the CVSS vector string is (AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:N/A:N).
notes.title: Vulnerability Summary

remediations.details: GE Digital released Proficy Historian 2023 to mitigate these vulnerabilities.  SIMs have also been released for all affected versions.
Users can find out more about the vulnerabilities, how to obtain, and install the updates by visiting this notification document from GE Digital.
